description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Silk Road Origins.

hook.text: China kept silk-making secret for 3,000 years. Smuggling it out meant death.

buildup.text: Silkworms spin cocoons of a single protein thread up to 900 meters long.

discovery.text: Workers unravel cocoons in hot water and twist filaments into yarn.
